item.title: Large pothole in the road, 18th December
item.description:
At the roundabout at crickley hill on the left hand side as you drive towards Cirencester in the roadworks there’s a large pothole in the road. I have just driven over it and my car shook with the impact.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): A417, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Same pothole. Another victim, 18th December
item.description:
Pothole on Leckhampton Road on opposite side of road to star college. It punctured my tyre on impact and another car 10 mins before me. It may have caused more damage but won’t be able to find out until my car has been towed tonight.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): B4070, Coberley, Cotswold
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Deep pothole on Court Road heading towards the church. Threw me off my bike in the dark, 18th December
item.description:
On court road as you head towards the church shortly after the roundabout at the community centre
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 29, Court Road, Brockworth, Gloucester

item.title: Blocked rain gully - council owned, 18th December
item.description:
GL526JR, outside 1a Pine Close Seven Trent Water visited the property today too advise on blocked drain. The blockage is in the private pipe and we have requested a plumber to fix. However, they said the council-owned part of the rain gully was full of leaves and blocked , so we needed to report it to the council immediately.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): 18, Ewens Road, Ewens Farm, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Cement and mud on road causing slippery surface, 18th December
item.description:

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): Chandos Drive, Brockworth, Tewkesbury
